name: Arcadebnb
description:
To be the best A**Bnb landowner you have to be the greediest and make your building taller and bigger. Attract all kinds of special guests to your building and keep them happy. Squeeze every penny out of your customers by fixing your property breakdowns yourself and preventing them from leaving without paying.

Keep your income and scores to the maximum in an arcade challenge at full speed.

Game submission to the first Dream Arcade Archive Jam. Instructions
  • Move using the arrow or WASD keys
  • Fix the breaking using the number key of each tool
Music from:

Gameboy SFX Pack #1 by OmegaOSG

Background music from Free Music Archive
